author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Refactored: Moved all the special code from ezcImageHandler abstract class
into ezcImageMethodcallHandler. The main handler class is now much cleaner
and exposes less special functions and properties to the public.
* Updated GD and ImageMagick handlers to extends the new class.
